Text: The Wonderful Thing About Tiggers:  Although Tigger's birthday is believed to be in October 1928, the year that "The House at Pooh Corner" was first published, on Tigger-related merchandise, Disney often indicates Tigger's birth year as 1968, a reference to the first year that Tigger appeared in a Disney production, "Winnie the Pooh and the Blustery Day".
Triplets:<Tiggers

--------------------
Text: The Wonderful Thing About Tiggers:  That was also the same instance when Tigger first sang this song.
Triplets:<The Wonderful Thing About Tiggers

5:

Text: The Wonderful Thing About Tiggers:  "The Wonderful Thing About Tiggers" opens up the 2000 release of "The Tigger Movie".
Triplets:<The Wonderful Thing About Tiggers

Text: The Wonderful Thing About Tiggers:  In 1974, Paul Winchell earned a Grammy for his rendition of the song.
